root.name: Mike Tyson Heavyweight Boxing
root.description: OVERVIEWDuring Mike Tyson's comeback run after he was released from Prison, developer Atomic Planet decided to make a Mike Tyson game. The game was made after Tyson's boxing career unofficially ended. The game was published by Codemasters and featured other heavyweights that were fighting during the 1990's like Tommy Morrison, and David Tua.
